snippet: Spanish officials announced the arrest of three suspects who were believed to have been planning attacks in Spain and elsewhere.
abstract: Spanish officials announce the arrest of three men suspected of having links to Al Qaeda and believed to have been planning attacks in Spain and elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: Spanish officials announced the arrest of three suspects who were believed to have been planning attacks in Spain and elsewhere.

headline.seo: 3 Arrested in Spain Are Accused of Having Links to Al Qaeda
headline.main: 3 Men Arrested in Spain Are Suspected of Having Links to Al Qaeda
headline.print_headline: 3 Men Arrested in Spain Are Suspected of Having Links to Al Qaeda
